markdownRemark.html:
오늘의 커밋

오픈 소스 프로젝트: 프로토타입 개발

원격 인턴십 프로그램인 Outreachy의 2차 과정인 오픈 소스 프로젝트 컨트리뷰션 활동을 적극적으로 참여한 덕분에, 프로젝트 담당 멘토님으로부터 최종 지원서에 포함된 계획서에 대한 안내사항들을 전달받았다. 지원서에는 최종 지원서를 제출하기 위해 프로젝트 계획을 세워보았다.

Your application should describe the component you plan on building. We are looking for evidence that you've thought hard about how a JSON schema component would be implemented. It might be helpful to include things like mock-ups of the user interface, descriptions of how the component works and its features, and some information about how you will implement it. Then, break that down into a timeline of how you will implement each part.

You do not have to know everything before you start! For example, if you're not sure how to make the component work on both the light and dark themes of the site, describe what you will need and a few techniques you could use, and put a few days into your timeline to research and decide which one to use.

  • json-schema-viewer mockup 기획 및 개발 정리

오늘의 풀리퀘스트
